loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Maria Omayra

texts.es:
Ella  es Maria Omayra  tiene 39 años es madre de 3 hijos, el anhelo es poder empezar a estudiar para superarse como persona y lograr el sueño de ser alguien en la vida, quiere estudiar  auxiliar farmacéutico para poder  surgir en otros campos laborales y ampliar los conocimientos, el deseo es tratar de independizarse, el poder estudiar ha sido un reto para ella, ya que por los 3 hijos económicamente no ha podido, pero ella sabe que con el convenio de kiva la ayuda que le pueden dar es muy grande, es una mujer de retos y de empuje por eso quiere demostrarlo. 
Esta es la hora que ve propicia para poder lograr profesionalizarse, ya que con esto les puede demostrar  y dar ejemplo a los hijos de que el estudio es muy importante en la vida.
Al estudiar servicios farmacéuticos cree que se le facilita un poco, ya que la experiencia laboral es en el sector salud, específicamente en medicamentos y  tiene idea de lo visto en este curso.
Sabe que esta es una carrera técnica, pero es un buen comienzo para poder impulsarse y seguir adelante con la carrera profesional, por que la idea no es quedarse ahí sino seguir adelante, no perder el impulso, espera poder realizar todos los sueños y algún día poder contar la historia pero siendo profesional.
texts.en:
Maria Omayra is 39 years old and the mother of three children. Her dream is to begin to study to improve herself as a person and to obtain her goal of being someone in life. She wants to study to be an assistant Pharmacist to enter into new fields of employment and expand her knowledge. She wants to become more independent. For her study is a challenge, as with 3 children she doesn't have the resources to do it. But having a loan from Kiva would be of great help to her. She is a woman who likes challenges and has drive and wants to demonstrate it. 

Now is the time she sees as good to become a professional, as doing so shows her children and gives an example of how important education is in life. Plus studying to be an assistant pharmacist will help as her work experience is in the health care sector, specifically medicine. So she has a good idea of what she'll see in the course. She knows that this is a technical degree but it is a good start that can push her forward into a professional career. The idea is to keep moving forward, not losing her momentum. She hopes she can realize all her dreams and have history tell the story of her being a professional.

loans.use: to pay a semester's tuition.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 35-year-old married father of one child who has been working in mixing and selling special perfume scents and women's accessories since six years ago. He is a hard worker, and he is well-known in his region for the special quality of perfumes he produces and the affordable prices he sets. 

Ali is acquiring a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua to increase his business merchandise with special newly released perfume scents and accessories to increase his retail sales and develop his socioeconomic situation.

He will work hard to expand his business and move to a larger place soon.

loans.use: to increase his business merchandise with special newly released perfumes and accessories.

loans.name: Rafael Enoc

texts.es:
El señor Rafael es una persona muy trabajadora y honesta vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su esposa y sus 6 hijos. Su negocio es la compra y venta de cerdos y leña desde hace 26 años, los cuales venden su comunidad y demás caseríos cercanos. 
Don Enoc está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de más producto como ser: cerdos que necesita  seguir realizando su negocio, espera que el préstamo le sirva de mucho ya que contara con los productos necesarios para seguir desarrollando su negocio y espera que sus ventas tengan un aumento y gracias a esto poder beneficiar el estilo de vida de la familia en el hogar.
Don Enoc espera aumentar su negocio y seguir apoyando a sus  hijos para que terminen los  estudios y así tengan mayores oportunidades en la vida.



Choluteca, Honduras – Enero 2014
texts.en:
Rafael is a hard working and honest person. He lives in a community in the south of Honduras, together with his wife and his 6 children. He has had a business purchasing and selling pigs and wood for 26 years. He sells them in his community and to other farmhouses nearby. Rafael is seeking a loan for the purchase of more products such as: pigs that he needs to continue operating his business. He hopes that the loan will serve him well now that he will be able to count on the products he needs to continue developing his business and he hopes that his sales will increase, and thanks to this incease the living standard of his family and his home will benefit. Rafael hopes to grow his business and to continue supporting his children so that they can complete their studies and  have more opportunities in life as a result. 

Choluteca, Honduras – January 2014

loans.use: to purchase pigs for his business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 62-year-old man from the county of Kakamega, located in the western part of Kenya. He is a married man and supports five people in his family. Along with his wife, he has two children, ages 14 and 22.

He is a painter by profession, a business he has been doing for the last five years. He generates a monthly income of 3,000 KES. He has applied for his fourth loan with VISION FUND KENYA, which he will use to boost his business by buying items such as paints, brushes, etc. He will use the anticipated profit to contribute back into the business.

His dream is to have a stable business.

loans.use: to improve his painting business

loans.name: Taras

texts.ru:
Тарас занимается установкой жалюзи на окна, гаражные ворота, а также монтажом натяжным потолков. У него есть один помощник-сотрудник. Так как бизнес пока небольшой и над клиентской базой еще нужно поработать, склад материалов пока располагается дома. У Тараса есть жена и двое детей. 
Тарас хотел бы закупить материал для изготовления оконных жалюзи, гаражных роллетов, а также дверей. Так как материалы должны быть качественными и прочными, ему нужны дополнительные финансовые средства, а именно сумма в 40 000 гривен. Со временем, немного подняв свой бизнес, Тарас очень хочет купить более современные инструменты и оборудование для работы.  
Пометка: на фотографии Тарас вместе со своей женой и одним из своих детей
texts.en: Taras installs window blinds, garage doors, and also assembles false ceilings. He has one assistant. Since the business is still small and the customer base still needs to be built up, his stock of materials is still kept at his house. Taras has a wife and two children. He would like to buy materials for preparation of window blinds, garage rollers, and also doors. Because the materials need to be high quality and durable, he needs additional financial capital, specifically 40,000 hryvnia. In time, when he has increased his business a bit, Taras really wants to buy more up-to-date tools and equipment for his work. Note: In the photo, Taras is with his wife and one of their children.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for manufacturing of blinds, garage roll down security shutters and doors

loans.name: Corcona Hacia El Progreso Group

texts.es: “CORCONA HACIA EL PROGRESO” es uno de los nuevos grupos que está conformada por 07 socias quienes se dedica a diversas actividades del comercio minorista. Maria tiene 50 años es conviviente con 03 hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas gaseosas habas chifles desde muy joven en forma ambulatoria. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de mas frutas gaseosas habas chifles. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Maria es la segunda persona parada del lado izquierdo viste polo a rayas de color rojo y plomo
texts.en:
“CORCONA HACIA EL PROGRESO” is a new group. It consists of 7 members who are involved in various activities in retail. 

Maria is 50 years old. She is married with 3 independent children. She sells sodas and dried broad bean and fried plantain snacks as an ambulant vendor. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of more products. The group thanks Kiva for the loan they are providing. Maria is the second person standing on the left in the striped red and gray shirt.

loans.use: to purchase sodas and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Koem Yon

texts.en:
Koem Yon, 38, is married and has two school-aged children. She resides in a peaceful village in Baray district, Kampong Thom province. To earn a living, Koem Yon operates a traveling sales business, selling soy milk, which is bottled after an aqueous extraction of soybeans. To have more clients and earn more profit, Koem Yon and her husband sell their products at different places respectively. Having been in the business for years, they are able to earn 5.00 USD per day on average.

Now she is requesting a loan of 1,500 USD to buy materials to repair her house. She hopes to accommodate her children with a suitable home, provide economic stability for her family, and provide an education to her children.

loans.use: to buy materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Kheng

texts.en:
Kheng, 35, lives in the Kampong Cham province’s Kampong Siem district in Cambodia. She has four children. She has been involved in farming rice and growing beans. Having been in this business for 16 years, she is able to earn 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.

This is the first loan cycle for Kheng with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is now applying for a loan to pay for the plowing of her field. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to plow her field

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kampong Siem district

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru:
Людмила живет в городе Мелитополе. Более 20 лет тому назад она вынуждена была искать средства к существованию своей семьи, тогда и решила заняться мелким предпринимательством. Торгуя на одном из крупных местных рынков спортивной одеждой, Людмила смогла со временем выкупить торговое место, таким образом, экономя на лишних затратах на оплату аренды. 
Людмила намерена приобрести сезонный спортивный товар на сумму в 10 000 гривен, а именно футболки, спортивные костюмы и куртки, для того, чтобы удовлетворить спрос среди покупателей в этом сезоне и развивать свой бизнес дальше.
texts.en: Ludmila lives in the city of Melitopol. Over 20 years ago she found it necessary to find a way to support her family, and decided then to become a small business person. Selling sportswear at one of the large local markets Ludmila was able to, with time, buy a market stall, thus saving on rent payments. Ludmila is planning on buying 10,000 hyrvnia of seasonal sportswear, in particular jerseys, and sports uniforms and jackets, to increase customer demand this season and further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal sportswear inventory

loans.name: Juana Maritza

texts.es: La señora Juana tiene 39 años y es Soltera con 2 hijos que son una mujer de 15 años y un varón de 17,  ella se dedica a la venta de sándwiches de chorizo, de carnes frías y bebidas  tiene su puesto de venta que se encuentra ubicado en la zona de  Villa El Carmen , este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la señora Juana va a usar este préstamo para La cliente comprará insumos para su negocio, como, aderezos, etc. para la elaboración de sándwiches,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta d efectivo para la compra de este insumo imprescindible para la elaboración de sus alimentos, la señora Juana enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia que se ha generado en la zona ya que es abundante, lo que le ha generado problemas a la cliente en cuanto a sus ingresos, va a utilizar los beneficios para la compra de 3 garrafas y demás insumos que necesita,  la señora Juana se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Juana is 39 years old. She is single and she has two children. One is a 15 year old daughter and the other is a 17 year old son. She works selling sausage and deli meat sandwiches and drinks. She has a stall that is located in the Villa El Carmen area. This loan is her first with this institution. Juana will use the loan to purchase supplies for her business, like seasonings for making sandwiches. Her reason for seeking this loan is her lack of cash for purchasing this  essential ingredient for the creation of her food. Juana faces challenges with her business including the abundant competition that is present in the area which has generated problems for her in terms of revenue. The profits of the loan will be used to buy three bottles and other supplies that she needs. Juana is happy and thankful to the institution for the support it has brought her in obtaining the loan.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her business like seasonings for making sandwiches.

loans.name: Clara

texts.es:
Doña Clara es una mujer de 42 años de edad emprendedora, luchadora y con muchos deseos de superarse la cual se desempeña en el hogar realizando actividades hogareñas desde muy temprano por la mañana ya que tiene 5 hijos pero con ella solo viven tres los dos mayores ya están en familia y hogares a parte, el tercero en la secundaria y los últimos 2 en la primaria. Ella aprendió a trabajar desde muy pequeña en el campo ya que a ella le gusto el proceso y procedimiento para cultivar café dándose cuenta que no solo era cavar un hoyo y depositar el grano, si no también, el cuido, abono, limpieza, etc. que lleva para una buena planta y al final de cada cosecha un excelente grano aprendiendo todo esto por sus padres. Ella también aprendió a elaborar nacatamales siendo sus clientes los diferentes habitantes de la zona cada fin de semana. En compañía de su esposo luchan diariamente para poder cumplir su sueño que es el de ver a sus hijos preparados, con carreras universitarias, con un mejor estilo de vida y en un mejor futuro así mismo fortalecer el patrimonio para ellos y que tengan donde construir sus hogares. 
Ella hoy en día ha solicitado financiamiento para la compra de productos agrícolas como abono, foliares, insecticidas, etc. para llevar a cabo la aplicación de los mismos para el cuidado de su café ya que también tiene una pequeña parcela de maíz y frijol generando más ganancias por medio de esto para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Clara is 42 years old. She is enterprising, hardworking, and with a great desire to get ahead in life. She works in housekeeping activities from an early hour every day because she has 5 children, though only three live with her. The two oldest have their own families and live apart. The third child is in middle school and the last 2 are in primary school. She learned to work in the field from the time she was very young because she like the process and procedures for cultivating coffee. She understood it wasn’t just a matter of digging a hole and planting a seed, but also taking care of it, fertilizing it, weeding, etc. that is needed to have a good plant and, at the end of each harvest, an excellent coffee bean. She learned all of this from her parents. She also learned to make nacatamales [a corn tamal wrapped in a banana leaf] and her customers are people from the neighborhood who buy on weekends. Along with her husband, they work together each day to be able to achieve their dream, which is to see their children educated, in university, with a better lifestyle, and at the same time to provide them with a good future and a place to build their houses. 

She has requested a loan to buy agricultural products such as fertilizer, foliar fertilizers, insecticides, etc. so that she can apply them in order to take care of the coffee plants. She also has a small piece of land with corn and beans, which generates more income for the wellbeing of her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for taking care of her coffee plants.
